DOC.brief_summary: Leucine supplementation is widely known for promoting strong influence on skeletal muscle remodeling. This study aims to evaluate the effect of leucine supplementation on disuse-induced skeletal muscle atrophy.
DOC.brief_title: Leucine Supplementation and Skeletal Muscle Disuse
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of anterior cruciate ligament injury Physically active Must be able to swallow tablets Nonsmokers Do not use nutritional supplements Postsurgical complications
